Name: Hot Spring Folding Screen: Moderation
Desc: A folding screen made of Aralia Wood. When used in combination, they can separate different areas within the hot spring grounds.\nPeople may get too excited and get drunk in the hot spring while drinking and admiring the moon. For safety reasons, the operators of the hot springs have stipulated that drinking in the pool is not allowed and that a separate area for wine tasting is required.
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
